attributes.action: To get cctv cameras installed near victoria park, Widnes
attributes.additional_details: We would like cctv cameras to be installed outside Victoria park in Widnes, on Fairfield Road, as drug use happens quite frequently, the police have been notified, yet it hasn't stopped the problem.

rejection.details: The e-petitions process is designed to allow individuals to raise issues about Government policy. The matter that you have raised is an operational one for law enforcement agencies.
